comments.body: This is normal for vault I guess? (i.e. no `AIRFLOW_` prefix here because this is expected?)
This paragraph explains how you can pass values to the Vault client. i.e. by setting Environment Variables for Vault.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +98,102 @@environment variables listed at https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/commands/#environment-variables are supported.

Hence, if you set ``VAULT_ADDR`` environment variable like below, you do not need to pass ``url``
key to ``backend_kwargs``:
